RelatedSentence: ONE OF THE most influential figures in Malaysia 's ruling party claims information about flight MH370 is being hidden and the Australian - led search for the plane off Western Australia is a waste of time and money .

'' The plane is somewhere , maybe without MAS [ Malaysia Airlines ] markings , '' he said .
